item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @roger12 roger12
item.description:
@roger12 wrote:

so say if this was the case i was just wondering how would i add another name to the commands i only know very basic coding and i started with 718 so yea.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {
if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“tom”) || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“Java”)) {
player.setRights(2);
player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData();
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You’re now an
admin.”);

or is there a way to make it so it works for all admins+

Read full topic
